mapper.sql: WITH r1 AS (SELECT DRIVE_REPORT_ID, SUBMITTER_ID_FK, FROM_SITE, TO_SITE, ITEM FROM drive_report_tb WHERE WRITER_ID_FK = ${writerIdFk} ORDER BY DRIVE_REPORT_ID DESC LIMIT 50 )
mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY_NAME FROM submitter_tb WHERE SUBMITTER_ID IN (SELECT SUBMITTER_ID_FK FROM r1) GROUP BY COMPANY_NAME LIMIT 10
SELECT FROM_SITE FROM r1 GROUP BY FROM_SITE HAVING FROM_SITE != '' LIMIT 10
SELECT TO_SITE FROM r1 GROUP BY TO_SITE HAVING TO_SITE != '' LIMIT 10
SELECT ITEM FROM r1 GROUP BY ITEM HAVING ITEM != '' LIMIT 10
SELECT TEL FROM submitter_tb WHERE SUBMITTER_ID IN (SELECT SUBMITTER_ID_FK FROM r1) GROUP BY TEL LIMIT 10
